game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find and retrieve the ancient artifact from the ruins.
game.description: In this quest, you must journey to the forgotten ruins in the heart of the jungle to discover the lost artifact. Beware of the dangers that lie ahead!
game.reward: 1000 experience points and a rare magical item

task.objective: Locate the entrance to the ruins
task.description: You need to find the hidden entrance among the dense vegetation. Talk to the local villagers for hints.
A statue guards the artifact. Solve the puzzle to deactivate it or face its wrath.
